content:
Check:
  any:
    - name: CLRESCAT
      operator: equal_to
      value: CLTEST
    - name: CLRESCAT
      operator: equal_to
      value: CLSCAT
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.161
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when CLRESCAT is equal to CLTEST or when CLRESCAT is equal
  to CLSCAT
Outcome:
  Message: CLRESCAT may not be equal to CLTEST and CLRESCAT may not be equal to CLSCAT
  Output Variables:
    - CLRESCAT
    - CLTEST
    - CLSCAT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '161'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: CLRESCAT is used for post collection categorization
                  of results and should not be a duplication of CLTEST or CLSCAT which
                  are considered categories at the time of collection.
                Document: IG v.3.1
                Section: 6.3.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CL

json.Description: Trigger error when CLRESCAT is equal to CLTEST or when CLRESCAT is equal to CLSCAT

Outcome.Message: CLRESCAT may not be equal to CLTEST and CLRESCAT may not be equal to CLSCAT

Citations.Cited_Guidance: CLRESCAT is used for post collection categorization of results and should not be a duplication of CLTEST or CLSCAT which are considered categories at the time of collection.
